body.h1: WSO2 Gadget Server in Anonymous mode
body.p: When a new user first launches the portal, the WSO2 Gadget Server provides the same user experience he/she will have in signed in mode. There will be a set of default gadgets displayed for the user and more gadgets are shown in add gadgets drop-down. The user can drag-drop gadgets and create his/her own gadget layout as preferred.
User data storage in anonymous mode is done using a browser cookie based storage mechanism.
Note: The anonymous mode will not give the user access to the Enterprise Gadget Repository and adding gadgets by specifying a URL is also disabled.
